annotation: Ashneer Grover's investments in season one ranged across all industries except healthcare.
Except education and technology Vineeta Singh invested in all other industries.
Aman Gupta made the most investments in season one and his investments ranged across all industries.
Anupam Mittal, too made atleast one investment in each industry.
Namita Thapar invested in all industries except automotives.
Peyush Bansal, too made investments in all industries except automotives.
Ghazal Alagh's entry in the show was towards the end of the season, so her investments only ranged across Food, Lifestyle, Healthcare and Manufacturing.
